p.d: The footballer Daniel Ogou has laid charges against Béranger Big-Beng because he thinks he recognised the tattoo on his arm as that of one of the gangsters who had attacked him during a private party! Directed by: Anselm Nfa (Ivory Coast, season 2, 2019) Cast: Sonia Aka (judge Savhera), Fredy Alain Gires Ayemou (officer Wanderma), Dehe Ange Kader (officer Sandro) Genre: comedy drama
